document_data.Description: ''Legends & Lore'' was a repackaged printing of ''[[Deities & Demigods 1st edition]]'' and is considered the sixth printing of that book. The content of ''Legends & Lore'' is almost identical to the fifth printing of ''Deities & Demigods''.{{ Cite web/Dungeons & Dragons FAQ }}
